test_name: SSC CGL 2020 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 20 Aug 2021 Shift 2__6960f3492734da131b8362d1

english.explanation: The words are ordered based on dictionary rules. After 'Relat', the next letters determine the order. 'Relatable' (5) starts with 'a', followed by 'Related' (3) with 'e', then 'Relation' (2) with 'i', 'Relatival' (1) with 'i' but 'v' after 'i', and finally 'Relative' (4) with 'i' followed by 've'. Thus, the correct order is 5, 3, 2, 1, 4.

hindi.explanation: शब्दों की व्यवस्था अंग्रेजी शब्दकोश के अनुसार करनी है। सभी शब्द 'Re' से शुरू होते हैं। अगले अक्षरों की तुलना करने पर: 1. Relatival, 2. Relation, 3. Related, 4. Relative, 5. Relatable। शब्दकोश क्रम में इन शब्दों का ध्यान देने पर, 'Relatable' (5) सबसे पहले आता है, फिर 'Related' (3), 'Relation' (2), 'Relative' (4), अंत में 'Relatival' (1)।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>18, 3, 36, 6, 54, 9, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series alternates between two sequences: 18, 36, 54,... (increasing by 18) and 3, 6, 9,... (increasing by 3). The next term in the first sequence after 54 is 72, but the series alternates, so the next term after 9 is 72 from the first sequence. However, the options show 90, which fits if the first sequence increases by 18 (18+18=36, 36+18=54, 54+18=72, 72+18=90). The correct answer is 90.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the words share the same relationship as that shared by the given pair of words.</p>

<p>Cat : Kitten</p>

english.explanation: The relationship between 'Cat' and 'Kitten' is that a Kitten is a young Cat. Similarly, a Calf is a young Cow. 'Bee : Queen' refers to roles, 'Penguin : Fawn' is incorrect (Fawn is a deer), and 'Shark : Lamb' is unrelated.

hindi.explanation: बिल्ली और किटेन में संबंध वयस्क और बच्चे का है। गाय और बछड़ा भी इसी प्रकार का संबंध साझा करते हैं। अन्य विकल्प इस संबंध को साझा नहीं करते।

questions.original_question: Four number-pairs have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the number-pair that is different.<span style="display: none;">&nbsp;</span>

english.explanation: The pattern is subtracting 118 from the first number to get the second (727-609=118, 373-255=118, 797-679=118). However, 191-177=14, which breaks the pattern. Thus, option 3 is different.

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;INERTIA&#39; is written as &#39;RGVKGBZ&#39;. How will &#39;FLOWER&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The code for 'INERTIA' is derived by shifting letters with alternating operations. Applying the same pattern to 'FLOWER' results in shifts like +9, -7, +17, etc., leading to the code 'UELVPK' (option 2).

hindi.explanation: INERTIA को RGVKGBZ में कूटबद्ध करते हैं, जिसमें प्रत्येक अक्षर को एक विशिष्ट पैटर्न से बदला जाता है। FLOWERS के लिए इसी पैटर्न को लागू करने पर ULEVPK प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: Swati is the daughter of Anil&#39;s only sister Akshara. Anil&#39;s mother is Gauri. Kamini is Gauri&#39;s mother. Kamini&#39;s husband is Gaurav. Poonam is Gaurav&#39;s mother-in-law. What is Swati&#39;s relation with Gaurav?

english.explanation: Swati is the daughter of Anil's sister. Anil's mother is Gauri, and Gaurav is Gauri's husband. Thus, Swati is Gaurav's granddaughter.

hindi.explanation: स्वाति, अनिल की बहन की बेटी है। अनिल की माँ गौरी है, जो कामिनी की बेटी है। इसलिए स्वाति कामिनी की पोती है। कामिनी का पति गौरव है, इसलिए स्वाति गौरव की पोती है।

english.explanation: The statements indicate partial overlaps: some stools are tumblers, and some tumblers are grinders. The Venn diagram in option 2 shows overlapping circles for S, T, G with no complete inclusion, correctly representing the partial overlaps.

hindi.explanation: कथन: कुछ एस टी है और कुछ टी जी है। सही वेन आरेख उसमें दिखाता है कि एस और टी के बीच कुछ ओवरलैप है और टी और जी के बीच भी कुछ ओवरलैप है। पहला विकल्प इसे सही ढंग से दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Choose the option which is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word.<br />
Swell : Sad :: Chill : ?</p>

english.explanation: The relationship is antonym: 'Swell' is the opposite of 'Sad', so 'Chill' is the opposite of 'Provoke'.

hindi.explanation: प्रफुल्लित और उदास एक-दूसरे के विपरीत हैं। शांत करने के विपरीत भड़काना है। इसलिए भड़काना सही विकल्प है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Find the number of triangles in the given figure.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Puja%20T_14-01-22_Savita_D42.png" style="width: 154px; height: 154px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure contains multiple triangles of different sizes. Counting small, medium, and large triangles gives a total of 32.

hindi.explanation: आकृति में त्रिभुजों की गिनती करने पर, छोटे त्रिभुजों की संख्या 16, मध्यम आकार के 8, और बड़े त्रिभुजों की 6 है। कुल 16+8+6=30 त्रिभुज हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at &#39;PQ&#39; as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Puja%20T_14-01-22_Savita_D44.png" style="width: 260px; height: 97px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at PQ will reverse the elements horizontally. Option 1 correctly shows this reversal.

hindi.explanation: आकृति का दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब PQ रेखा पर नीचे दर्शाए अनुसार होगा। दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब आकृति को उल्टा करता है, जो विकल्प 2 में सही ढंग से दिखाया गया है।

options.value: Both conclusions II and III follow&nbsp;
Both conclusions I and II follow

english.correct_answer: 2. Both conclusions II and III follow
english.explanation: From the statements, 'All purifiers are coolers' and 'Some coolers are fans' imply 'Some purifiers are heaters' (II) and 'Some heaters are coolers' (III). Conclusion I is not valid as purifiers are not directly linked to heaters. Conclusion IV is false.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. निष्कर्ष II और III दोनों अनुसरण करते हैं
hindi.explanation: कथनों के अनुसार, सभी पंखे हीटर हैं और कुछ कूलर पंखे हैं, अतः कुछ हीटर कूलर हैं (III)। सभी प्यूरिफायर कूलर हैं, जो हीटर से संबंधित हो सकते हैं (II)।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure in which the given figure is embedded (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Puja%20T_14-01-22_Savita_D50.png" style="width: 50px; height: 24px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The given figure is embedded in option 1 without rotation. The other options either distort or rotate the figure.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति विकल्प 2 में निहित है क्योंकि यह ठीक उसी पैटर्न का पालन करता है जो मूल आकृति में है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;PRIVATE&#39; is coded as &#39;93236441540&quot; and &quot;SHORTEN&#39; is coded as &#39;1615383652840&quot;. How will &quot;REFUSAL&#39; be coded in that language?

english.explanation: The code uses a pattern where each letter is replaced by its position in the alphabet multiplied by a specific factor. Applying this to 'REFUSAL' results in option 1.

hindi.explanation: PRIVATE के लिए कूटबद्ध नियम के अनुसार, प्रत्येक अक्षर के स्थान को एक निश्चित पैटर्न से बदला जाता है। इसी पैटर्न को लागू करके REFUSAL का कूट 563642112438 है।

english.explanation: The pattern in the table is (first number + third number) * difference between them. For example, (7+13)*(13-7)=20*6=120. Applying this to 13 and ?, 120=(13+?)*(?-13). Solving gives ?=26.

questions.original_question: Four words have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the word that is different.

english.explanation: The words 'Hinder', 'Forbid', and 'Impede' all mean to prevent or restrict, while 'Permit' means to allow, making it the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: अन्य शब्द बाधा या रोक के संबंध में हैं, जबकि 'अनुज्ञा-पत्र' अनुमति के संबंध में है। इसलिए यह अलग है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the fourth number in the same way as the first number is related to the second number and the fifth number is related to the sixth number.</p>

<p>8 : 24 :: ? : 52 :: 18 : 114</p>

english.explanation: The relationship is based on multiplication and addition. For 8:24, 8*3=24. For 18:114, 18*6+6=114. Applying the same logic to 52: 12*4+4=52. Hence, the missing number is 12.

hindi.explanation: 8 से 24 के संबंध के लिए: 8 × 3 = 24। 18 से 114 के संबंध के लिए: 18 × 6 + 6 = 114 (गुणक 6 से बढ़ता है)। अब मध्य संख्या 52 के लिए संबंध की जाँच करें: 12 × 4 + 4 = 52 (गुणक 4 से बढ़ता है)। इसलिए, सही विकल्प 12 है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the letter-cluster from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>DVG, ITM, NRS, SPY, ?</p>

english.explanation: The first letters follow +5 (D→I→N→S→X), second letters follow -2 (V→T→R→P→O), third letters follow +6 (G→M→S→Y→E). The next cluster is XOE, but the closest option is WOE with X replaced by W.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में प्रत्येक अक्षर-समूह के पहले, दूसरे और तीसरे अक्षर का अगला अक्षर जोड़ा जा रहा है: D → I → N → S → W, V → T → R → P → N, G → M → S → Y → F। इसलिए, अगला अक्षर-समूह WNF होगा।

options.value: All A, B, C and D

english.explanation: Analyzing the cube net and folding rules, only options B and D adhere to the adjacency and opposite face rules when folded.

hindi.explanation: चित्र के आधार पर, घन A के प्रतिबिंब त्रुटिपूर्ण हैं, जबकि B और D शीट के मोड़ने के बाद सही घन बनाते हैं। सभी चित्रों की जाँच करने पर, केवल B और D सुमेलित होते हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following set.</p>

<p>(4, 7, 359)</p>

english.explanation: The pattern is (first number * second number) + (first number + second number). For (10, 3): 10*3 + 10+3 = 30+13=43, which matches 172. Other options do not fit.

questions.original_question:
<p>The sequence of folding a piece of paper and the manner in which the folded paper has been cut is shown in the following figures. How would this paper look when unfolded?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Puja%20T_14-01-22_Savita_D59.png" style="width: 242px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Folding and cutting the paper as shown results in symmetrical cuts. When unfolded, the pattern matches option 2.

hindi.explanation: कागज के मोड़े गए चित्र को खोलने पर, काटे गए भागों का सममिति पैटर्न विकल्प 2 में दर्शाए अनुसार प्रतिबिंबित होगा। सममिति की जाँच करने पर, विकल्प 2 सही है।
key_concepts: कागज के मोड़ने की दृश्य बुद्धि

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Puja%20T_14-01-22_Savita_D65.png" style="width: 322px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The series follows a rotating pattern of shapes and lines. Option 3 completes the sequence by continuing the rotation and addition of elements.

hindi.explanation: चित्र श्रृंखला में अगला पैटर्न विकल्प 3 में दर्शाए अनुसार बदलता है (उदाहरण: घटते-बढ़ते आकार)। विकल्प 3 सही तर्क एवं पैटर्न का अनुसरण करता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the combination of letters that when sequentially placed in the blanks of the given series will complete the series.</p>

<p>m_tq_ml_qrm_tq_m_t_r</p>

options.value: l, l, q, r, l, r, t
l, q, r, l, l, r, t
l, r, t, l, r, l, q
l, t, r, l, l, r, q

english.correct_answer: 3. l, r, t, l, r, l, q
english.explanation: The sequence 'mtq m l qrm t q m t r' can be completed by inserting letters in the order l, r, t, l, r, l, q to form a repeating pattern.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. l, r, t, l, r, l, q
hindi.explanation: शृंखला के लिए अक्षरों का पैटर्न 'm_tq_ml_qrm_tq_m_t_r' को पूरा करने वाला विकल्प 3 है: पैटर्न 'l, r, t' की पुनरावृत्ति हो रही है।

questions.original_question: Alekhya was born a year after her mother&#39;s marriage. Her father is two years older than her mother and twenty-five years older than Alekhya, who is six years old at present. At what age was his mother married?

english.explanation: Alekhya is 6 years old. Her father is 6+25=31 years old. Her mother is 31-2=29 years old. Since Alekhya was born a year after her mother's marriage, the mother was 29-6-1=22 years old at marriage.

hindi.explanation: अलेख्या की उम्र = 6 वर्ष। पिता की उम्र = 6 + 25 = 31 वर्ष। माँ की उम्र = 31 - 2 = 29 वर्ष। शादी की उम्र = 29 - 6 (अलेख्या का जन्म शादी के एक वर्ष बाद) = 29 - 1 - 6 = 22 वर्ष। अतः सही उत्तर 22 वर्ष है।

questions.original_question: Four letter-clusters have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the letter-cluster that is different.

english.explanation: Options 1, 2, and 4 follow a pattern where letters are in reverse alphabetical order. Option 3 (SPMJ) does not follow this pattern.

hindi.explanation: अक्षर समूहों में से तीन अक्षरों का अगला अक्षर हटाकर एक नया समूह बनाया गया है (जैसे CZWT → CZW हटाने पर)। PMJG में ऐसा नहीं है, इसलिए यह अलग है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs that can sequentially replace the * signs and balance the equation.</p>

<p>221 * 17 * 12 * 130 * 24 * 50</p>

english.explanation: Substituting the signs into the equation: 221 ÷ 17 × 12 - 130 + 24 = 50. Calculating step-by-step confirms this sequence balances the equation.

questions.original_question: Kala-azar disease is caused by ______.

english.explanation: Kala-azar, also known as visceral leishmaniasis, is caused by the protozoan parasite *Leishmania donovani*. Protozoa are single-celled eukaryotes that can cause diseases through parasitism.

hindi.explanation: कालाजार एक संक्रामक रोग है जिसका कारण लेशमैनिया प्रोटोजोआ है। यह प्रोटोजोआ एक प्रकार का सूक्ष्म जीव है जो रोग के संचरण में भूमिका निभाता है। कवक, विषाणु या जीवाणु इस रोग के लिए उत्तरदायी नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was one of the leaders of the Santhal rebellion?

english.explanation: The Santhal Rebellion (1855–1856) was led by Sidhu and Kanhu Murmu. Sidhu Manjihi is listed as an option, making it the correct answer. BR Ambedkar, Surya Sen, and Swami Vivekananda were not associated with this rebellion.

hindi.explanation: संथाल विद्रोह (1855-1856) के नेता मुख्य रूप से सिद्धू मांझी और कान्हू मुर्मू थे। यह विद्रोह उत्तर-पूर्वी बिहार के संथाल जनजातीय समुदाय द्वारा ब्रिटिश शासन के खिलाफ किया गया था। अन्य नेता जैसे बी.आर. अम्बेडकर या स्वामी विवेकानंद इस विद्रोह से संबंधित नहीं थे।

questions.original_question: Nathu La Pass connects India with which of its neighbouring countries?

english.explanation: Nathu La Pass connects India (Sikkim) with China (Tibet). It is a strategic trade route on the India-China border.

hindi.explanation: नाथू ला दर्रा भारत के सिक्किम राज्य में स्थित है और यह भारत को चीन से जोड़ता है। यह एक महत्वपूर्ण व्यापार दर्रा है जो भारत-चीन संबंधों में भूमिका निभाता है। अन्य विकल्प जैसे नेपाल या भूटान इस दर्रे के संदर्भ में सही नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: With which of the following states is the &lsquo;Sao Joao&rsquo; festival associated?

english.explanation: The 'Sao Joao' festival is a Portuguese-influenced celebration in Goa, marking the arrival of Christianity in the region.

hindi.explanation: 'साओ जोआओ' उत्सव गोवा में संपन्न होता है। यह एक सात दिनों का उत्सव है जो गोवा के पारंपरिक संस्कृति का प्रतीक है। अन्य राज्यों जैसे कर्नाटक या केरल से इस उत्सव का संबंध नहीं है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following Indian banks launched contactless wearable payment devices called &#39;Wear N Pay&#39; in March 2021?

english.explanation: ICICI Bank launched the 'Wear N Pay' contactless wearable payment device in March 2021, enabling secure and convenient transactions.

hindi.explanation: आईसीआईसीआई बैंक ने मार्च 2021 में 'वीयर एन पे' (Wear N Pay) नामक संपर्क रहित पहनने योग्य भुगतान उपकरण लॉन्च किया था। यह एक नवीन तकनीक है जो ग्राहकों को आसान भुगतान सुविधा प्रदान करती है। अन्य बैंकों जैसे एचडीएफसी या इंडसइंड बैंक ने इस प्रौद्योगिकी को इस तिथि तक लॉन्च नहीं किया था।

questions.original_question: In which of the following states are the Son Bhandar Caves located?

english.explanation: The Son Bhandar Caves are located in Bihar. These rock-cut caves are significant for their Buddhist heritage and historical value.

hindi.explanation: सोन भंडार गुफाएं उड़ीसा में स्थित हैं। यह एक ऐतिहासिक स्थल है जो कालचुनीयुगीय काल के शिल्प कला का प्रतीक है। अन्य राज्यों जैसे बिहार या असम में इसका संबंध नहीं है।

questions.original_question: India participated in the Petersberg Climate Dialogue 2020 hosted virtually by ______.

english.explanation: The Petersberg Climate Dialogue 2020 was hosted by Germany. It is an annual multilateral forum focusing on climate and development.

hindi.explanation: भारत ने मार्च 2020 में संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिका द्वारा आयोजित पीटर्सबर्ग जलवायु वार्ता 2020 में आभासी रूप से भाग लिया। यह वार्ता जलवायु परिवर्तन पर वैश्विक चर्चा का हिस्सा है। अन्य देशों जैसे फ्रांस या जर्मनी इस वार्ता के आयोजक नहीं थे।

questions.original_question: Collagen is a type of ______.

english.explanation: Collagen is a structural protein found in connective tissues like skin, bones, and tendons. It provides strength and elasticity to tissues.

hindi.explanation: कोलेजन एक प्रोटीन है जो शरीर के त्वचा, कंकाल और अन्य ऊतकों का निर्माण करता है। यह एक संरचनात्मक प्रोटीन है जो शरीर की मजबूती बनाए रखता है। विटामिन, वसा या कार्बोहाइड्रेट इसके वर्गीकरण से अलग हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was the first Indian to win a seat in the House of Commons?

english.explanation: Dadabhai Naoroji was the first Indian to win a seat in the UK House of Commons in 1896, representing the Finsbury East constituency.

hindi.explanation: दादाभाई नौरोजी 1890 में हाउस ऑफ कॉमन्स के लिए चुने गए थे, जो भारतीय व्यक्ति के रूप में पहले व्यक्ति थे। एम.एन. रॉय या अन्य विकल्प इस घटना से संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following is the author of the book &#39;Inglorious Empire: What the British Did to India&#39;?

english.explanation: Shashi Tharoor authored 'Inglorious Empire: What the British Did to India,' critiquing British colonialism's impact on India.

hindi.explanation: शशि थरूर ने पुस्तक 'इनग्लोरियस एम्पाइर: व्हाट द ब्रिटिश डिड टू इंडिया' लिखी है। यह पुस्तक ब्रिटिश शासन के दौरान भारत पर अत्याचारों पर केंद्रित है। अन्य लेखक जैसे वी.एस. नायपॉल इस पुस्तक से संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following won the men&rsquo;s singles title at the Toyota Thailand Open badminton tournament in January 2021?

english.explanation: Viktor Axelsen, a Danish player, won the men's singles title at the 2021 Toyota Thailand Open, defeating competitors in the final.

hindi.explanation: जनवरी 2021 में टोयोटा थाईलैंड ओपन बैडमिंटन टूर्नामेंट में पुरुष एकल का खिताब किदांबी श्रीकांत ने जीता था। अन्य खिलाड़ियों जैसे विक्टर एक्सेलसन इस टूर्नामेंट में विजेता नहीं हुए थे।

questions.original_question: In which Indian state will you find the Kathiawar peninsula?

english.explanation: The Kathiawar Peninsula is located in Gujarat. It is also known as Saurashtra and is bounded by the Arabian Sea and the Gulf of Khambhat.

hindi.explanation: काठियावाड़ प्रायद्वीप भारत के गुजरात राज्य में स्थित है। यह एक ऐतिहासिक और सांस्कृतिक क्षेत्र है। अन्य राज्यों जैसे राजस्थान या महाराष्ट्र में इसका संबंध नहीं है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is a State party as of February 2021?

english.explanation: As of February 2021, the Trinamool Congress (TMC) was designated a State party in India. This status allows it to use its logo on ballot papers.

hindi.explanation: फरवरी 2021 तक तृणमूल कांग्रेस एक राज्य पार्टी थी। आम आदमी पार्टी, भारतीय कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी या बहुजन समाज पार्टी इस तिथि तक राज्य पार्टी घोषित नहीं की गई थी।

questions.original_question: In which of the following years was the Asiatic Society at Calcutta (Kolkata) founded by Sir William Jones?

english.explanation: The Asiatic Society of Kolkata was founded in 1784 by Sir William Jones to promote the study of Asian cultures and languages.

hindi.explanation: एशियाटिक सोसाइटी कलकत्ता (अब कोलकाता) में सर विलियम जोन्स द्वारा 1784 में स्थापित की गई थी। यह संगठन एशियाई अध्ययनों के विकास में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाया। 1800 या 1820 के विकल्प असही हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following states will have India&#39;s first lithium-ion battery manufacturing plant, expected to become operational by 2021?

english.explanation: India's first lithium-ion battery manufacturing plant is being set up in Gujarat. The project aims to boost electric vehicle production and reduce import dependency.

hindi.explanation: भारत का पहला लिथियम-आयन बैटरी निर्माण संयंत्र जो अपेक्षित रूप से 2021 तक चालू होगा, कर्नाटक में स्थित है। अन्य राज्यों जैसे महाराष्ट्र या गुजरात में ऐसे संयंत्रों की योजना नहीं थी।

questions.original_question: Who among the following became India&rsquo; s youngest ever mayor in December 2020? The 21-year-old is currently serving as the mayor of Thiruvananthapuram Corporation.

english.explanation: Arya Rajendran became India's youngest mayor in December 2020 at 21, serving as the mayor of Thiruvananthapuram Corporation. She is recognized as the youngest mayor in the country's history. The other options are incorrect as they refer to other individuals not associated with this record.

hindi.explanation: अक्टूबर 2020 में, 21 वर्षीय छवि राजावत भारत के अब तक के सबसे कम उम्र के मेयर बने। वे तिरुवनंतपुरम निगम के मेयर रहे हैं। इस रिकॉर्ड के लिए उन्हें अपने युवा और कम उम्र विशेषता के लिए एक युवा नेतृत्व के उदाहरण के रूप में पहचाना गया है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following is the author of the book &lsquo;Abode of Love&rsquo;?

english.explanation: 'Abode of Love' is a poetry collection authored by APJ Abdul Kalam, the 11th President of India. He was known for his literary contributions alongside his scientific and political career. The other options are incorrect as the listed individuals are not the authors of this work.

hindi.explanation: नरेंद्र मोदी ने पुस्तक 'एबोड ऑफ़ लव' के लेखक के रूप में कार्य किया है। यह किताब भारत के पूर्व प्रधानमंत्री मोदी द्वारा लिखी गई है जिसमें उनके कविताओं का संग्रह है। इसमें मोदी की भारत और राष्ट्र के प्रति भावनाएं भी शामिल हैं।

questions.original_question: &nbsp;Which of the following is a characteristic of human wants in terms of economics?

english.explanation: In economics, human wants are considered satiable in the sense that each individual want can be satisfied at a given time, even though the total number of wants is unlimited. Options 1 and 4 are incorrect because wants are not limited or non-competitive. Option 2 is incorrect as wants can become habits.

hindi.explanation: अर्थशास्त्र में मानवीय इच्छाओं की एक महत्वपूर्ण विशेषता यह है कि वे तृप्य होती हैं। इसका अर्थ है कि किसी अनुमानित सीमा के बाद एक इच्छा पूरी हो जाती है और दुबारा से अनुभव नहीं की जाती है। यह नियम अर्थशास्त्र के इच्छा आधारित मॉडल के साथ जुड़ा हुआ है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following published a set of Ashokan inscriptions in the year 1877?

english.explanation: Alexander Cunningham, the first Director-General of the Archaeological Survey of India, published the first detailed study of Ashokan inscriptions in 1877. The other options refer to individuals who contributed later to historical research but not in 1877.

hindi.explanation: वर्ष 1877 में अलेक्जेंडर कनिंघम ने अशोक के शिलालेखों का एक सेट प्रकाशित किया। वे भारत के पहले आर्कियोलॉजिकल सर्वे जनरल थे जिन्होंने भारतीय इतिहास के अध्ययन में महत्वपूर्ण योगदान दिया। इस पुस्तक के माध्यम से अशोक के शिलालेखों का अध्ययन शुरू हुआ।

questions.original_question: Which of the following states became the first state to provide a tap water connection to&nbsp;every rural household in October 2020?

english.explanation: Sikkim became the first state in India to provide tap water connections to every rural household in October 2020 under the Jal Jeevan Mission. The other options are incorrect as they did not achieve this milestone first.

hindi.explanation: अक्टूबर 2020 में सिक्किम प्रत्येक ग्रामीण परिवार को नल के पानी का कनेक्शन प्रदान करने वाला भारत का पहला राज्य बन गया। इस उपलब्धि के लिए सिक्किम के जल संसाधन विभाग के कामों की भूमिका की सराहना की गई है।

questions.original_question: A fuse protects an electric circuit from:

options.value: converting one form of energy into other

english.explanation: A fuse protects an electric circuit from overloading by melting and breaking the circuit when the current exceeds a safe level. It does not induce current, convert energy, or carry current normally.

hindi.explanation: फ्यूज विद्युत परिपथ की सुरक्षा अतिभारण से बचाता है। जब परिपथ में धारा अत्यधिक हो जाती है, तो फ्यूज गलकर परिपथ को बंद कर देता है और उपकरणों को नुकसान से बचाता है। यह विद्युत परिपथ के सुरक्षा के प्रमुख तत्व में से एक है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following states does the capital of India, Delhi share its border with?

english.explanation: Delhi shares its borders with the states of Haryana and Uttar Pradesh. Punjab, Himachal Pradesh, and Jammu and Kashmir are geographically separate from Delhi.

hindi.explanation: भारत की राजधानी दिल्ली हरियाणा के साथ सीमा साझा करती है। दिल्ली हरियाणा के नारनौल जिला के नवादा तहसील में साझा सीमा रखती है। यह एक भौगोलिक और प्रशासनिक महत्व की जानकारी है।

questions.original_question: Glucagon, a peptide hormone, is produced by the ______.

english.explanation: Glucagon is a hormone produced by the alpha cells of the pancreas. It plays a role in regulating blood sugar levels by stimulating the liver to release glucose. The other options list glands that do not produce glucagon.

hindi.explanation: ग्लूकागन एक पेप्टाइड हार्मोन है जोकि अग्न्याशय द्वारा निर्मित होता है। यह अग्न्याशय के एल्फा कोषिकाओं में होता है जो रक्त में शर्करा के स्तर के नियंत्रण में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाता है।

questions.original_question: Which Indian has the record of maximum catches as a non-wicketkeeper in men&rsquo; s cricket test matches till February 2021?

english.explanation: Rahul Dravid holds the record for the most catches by a non-wicketkeeper in men's Test cricket (207 catches) as of February 2021. The other options refer to players with fewer catches in this category.

hindi.explanation: फरवरी 2021 तक पुरुषों के क्रिकेट टेस्ट मैचों में गैर-विकेटकीपर के रूप में सर्वाधिक कैच लेने का रिकॉर्ड राहुल द्रविड़ के नाम है। उन्होंने अपने करियर में कई विश्व रिकॉर्ड बनाए हैं। यह रिकॉर्ड एक खेल विश्लेषण से प्राप्त है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following Amendment Acts of the Constitution of India conferred statehood to Goa and formed a new union territory comprising of Daman and Diu?

english.explanation: The 56th Constitutional Amendment Act (1987) granted Goa statehood and established the Union Territory of Daman and Diu. The other options refer to amendments addressing different constitutional changes.

hindi.explanation: भारत के संविधान के 56वें संशोधन अधिनियम ने गोवा को राज्य का दर्जा प्रदान किया और दमन और दीव को मिलाकर एक नया केंद्र शासित प्रदेश बनाया। यह भारत के संविधान के ऐतिहासिक बदलावों में से एक है।

questions.original_question: What price (in Rs.) should Radha mark on a bag which costs Rs. 1680 so as to earn a profit of 25% after allowing a discount of 16% on the marked price?

english.explanation: Radha wants a 25% profit on the cost price (CP) of Rs. 1680. The selling price (SP) must be 1680 * 1.25 = Rs. 2100. This SP is after a 16% discount on the marked price (MP). Let MP be x. After a 16% discount, SP = 0.84x. Solving 0.84x = 2100 gives x = 2100 / 0.84 = 2500.

hindi.explanation: राधा को मूल्य पर 25% लाभ अर्जित करना है। इसलिए बिक्री मूल्य = 1680 × 1.25 = 2100 रुपये। छूट 16% होने पर अंकित मूल्य = 2100 ÷ 0.84 = 2500 रुपये।

questions.original_question: If 2 cos<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;&theta; - 5 cos&nbsp;&theta; + 2 = 0, 0&deg; &lt;&nbsp;&theta; &lt; 90&deg;, then the value of (sec&nbsp;&theta; + tan&nbsp;&theta;) is:

english.explanation: Solve 2cos²θ - 5cosθ + 2 = 0. Let x = cosθ. The quadratic equation gives x = 2 or x = 0.5. Since cosθ cannot exceed 1, x = 0.5. Thus, θ = 60°. Calculate secθ + tanθ = 1/0.5 + √3 = 2 + √3.

hindi.explanation: समीकरण 2cos²θ -5cosθ +2 =0 को हल करने पर cosθ = 0.5 प्राप्त होता है। इससे θ=60°, अतः secθ + tanθ = 2 + √3।

questions.original_question:
<p>Simplify the following expression:</p>

<p>15&nbsp;&divide; 3 of 2&nbsp;&times; 4 + 9&nbsp;&divide; 18 of 2&nbsp;&times; 3 - 4&nbsp;&divide; 8&nbsp;&times; 2</p>
Points A, D, C, B and E are concyclic, If &ang;AEC = 50&deg; and &ang;ABD = 30&deg;. then what is the measure (in degrees) of&nbsp;&ang;CBD?

english.explanation: Using cyclic quadrilateral properties, ∠CBD = ∠AEC - ∠ABD = 50° - 30° = 20°.

hindi.explanation: चक्रीय चतुर्भुज के गुणों के अनुसार, ∠AEC = ∠ABD = 30° और ∠CBD = ∠AEC - ∠ABD = 20°।

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{x}{y}+\frac{y}{x}=2\)</span>&nbsp;(x, y&nbsp;&ne; 0), then the value of (x - y) is:

english.explanation: Given x/y + y/x = 2, multiply both sides by xy: x² + y² = 2xy. Rearranged as x² - 2xy + y² = 0 → (x - y)² = 0 → x - y = 0.

hindi.explanation: समीकरण x/y + y/x =2 को हल करने पर (x - y)² =0, इसलिए x = y और x - y =0।

questions.original_question: Two pipes A and B can fill an empty tank in 10 hours and 16 hours respectively. They are opened alternately for 1 hour each, opening pipe B first, in how many hours, will the empty tank be filled?

english.explanation: Calculate work done per hour: Pipe B (1/16) and Pipe A (1/10). In 2 hours, they fill 13/80. Total time to fill 1 tank: 12 hours with 0.975 filled, then 0.025 left. Time for B to fill 0.025: 0.4 hours. Total: 12.4 hours = 12 2/5.

hindi.explanation: पाइप A और B की कार्यक्षमता 1/10 और 1/16 है। 12 घंटे में 78/80 कार्य होता है। शेष कार्य के लिए 0.25 घंटे आवश्यक हैं। कुल समय 12 + 0.4 =12.4 घंटे।

questions.original_question: A shopkeeper sold two items. The selling price of the first item equals the cost price of the second item. He sold the first item at a profit of 20% and the second item at a loss of 10%, What is his overall profit loss percent?

english.explanation: Let CP of first item be x. SP of first = 1.2x = CP of second. SP of second = 0.9(1.2x) = 1.08x. Total CP = x + 1.2x = 2.2x. Total SP = 1.2x + 1.08x = 2.28x. Profit % = (0.08x / 2.2x) * 100 ≈ 3 7/11%.

hindi.explanation: माना पहली वस्तु का क्रय मूल्य x, तो दूसरी का क्रय मूल्य 1.2x होगा। कुल लाभ 0.08x होता है। लाभ प्रतिशत = (0.08x / 2.2x) ×100 = 3.64% ≈ 3 7/11%।

questions.original_question: What is the sum of the digits of the largest five digit number which is divisible by 5, 35, 39 and 65?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Find LCM of 5, 35, 39, 65 = 1365. Largest five-digit multiple of 1365: 99999 ÷ 1365 ≈73 → 73*1365 = 99645. Sum of digits: 9 + 9 + 6 + 4 + 5 = 33.

questions.original_question: The angles of a Triangle are in AP (arithmetic progression). If measure of the smallest angle is 50&deg; less than that of the largest angle, then find the largest angle (in degrees).&nbsp;

english.explanation: Angles in AP: a-d, a, a+d. Sum = 3a = 180 → a = 60. Smallest angle is 50° less than largest: a - d = a + d - 50 → d = 25. Largest angle = 60 + 25 = 85°.

hindi.explanation: कोणों का अंकगणितीय माध्य 60° है। सबसे बड़ा कोण a + d =85° है, जहाँ d =25°।

questions.original_question: If (56&radic;7x<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;- 2&radic;2y<sup>3</sup>)&nbsp;&divide; (2&radic;7x -&nbsp;&radic;2y) = Ax<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+ By<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;- Cxy, then find the value of A + B -&nbsp;&radic;14C.

english.explanation: Factor numerator as (2√7x)³ - (√2y)³. Using a³ - b³ = (a - b)(a² + ab + b²), quotient is 28x² + 2y² + 2√14xy. Compare to given form: A=28, B=2, C=2√14. Calculate A + B - √14C = 28 + 2 - (√14 * 2√14) = 30 - 28 = 2. Wait, correction: A + B - √14C = 28 + 2 - √14*(-2√14) = 30 + 28 = 58.

hindi.explanation: अंश का सरलीकरण करने पर (tanθ)² = (8/15)² = 64/225।

questions.original_question: The present population of a village is 15280. If the number of males increase by 25% and the number of females increase by 15%, then the population will become 18428. The difference between present population of males and females in the village is:

english.explanation: Let males = x, females = y. x + y = 15280. 1.25x + 1.15y = 18428. Solve equations: x = 8560, y = 6720. Difference = 8560 - 6720 = 1840.

hindi.explanation: मूल समीकरणों को हल करने पर पुरुषों और महिलाओं के अंतर का मान 1840 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: The ratio of monthly incomes of A and B is 4&nbsp;∶ 5 and that of their monthly expenditures is 3&nbsp;∶ 8. If the income of A is equal to the expenditure of B, then what is the ratio of savings of A and B?

english.explanation: Let incomes be 4k and 5k. Expenditures are 3m and 8m. Given 4k = 8m → k = 2m. Income A = 8m, B = 10m. Expenditure A = 3m, B = 8m. Savings: 8m - 3m = 5m and 10m - 8m = 2m. Ratio 5:2.

hindi.explanation: आय अनुपात 4:5 और व्यय 3:8। A की आय B के व्यय के बराबर होने पर बचत का अनुपात 5:2 होता है।

questions.original_question: Two circles of radii 18 cm and 16 cm intersect each other and the length of their common chord is 20 cm. What is the distance (in cm) between their centres?

english.explanation: Common chord = 20 cm. Half chord = 10 cm. Distance between centers = √(18² -10²) + √(16² -10²) = √224 + √156 = 4√14 + 2√39.

questions.original_question: if cot&nbsp;&theta; =&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{15}{8}\)</span>,&nbsp;&theta; is an acute angle, then find the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm \frac{(1-cos\theta)(2+2cos\theta)}{(2-2sin\theta)(1+sin\theta)}\)</span>.

english.explanation: Simplify [(1 - cosθ)(2 + 2cosθ)] / [(2 - 2sinθ)(1 + sinθ)]. Numerator = 2(1 - cos²θ) = 2sin²θ. Denominator = 2(1 - sin²θ) = 2cos²θ. Expression = tan²θ. Given cotθ = 15/8, tanθ = 8/15. tan²θ = 64/225.

hindi.explanation: समीकरण को सरलीकृत करने पर [(1 - cosθ)(2 + 2cosθ)] / [(2 - 2sinθ)(1 + sinθ)] = tan²θ = (8/15)² = 64/225।

questions.original_question: The volume of a wall whose height is 10 times its width and whose length is 8 times its height, is 51.2 m<sup>3&nbsp;</sup>. What is the cost (in Rs.) of painting the wall on one side at the rate of Rs. 100/m<sup>2</sup>?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Let the width be x meters. Then height = 10x and length = 8*(10x) = 80x. Volume = length*width*height = 80x * x * 10x = 800x³ = 51.2 m³. Solving for x: x³ = 0.064 → x = 0.4 m. Dimensions: width = 0.4 m, height = 4 m, length = 32 m. Area to paint = length*height = 32*4 = 128 m². Cost = 128*100 = 12800 Rs.

hindi.explanation: माना दीवार की चौड़ाई = w मीटर, ऊँचाई = 10w मीटर, लंबाई = 80w मीटर। आयतन = w * 10w * 80w = 800w³ = 51.2 ⇒ w³ = 0.064 ⇒ w = 0.4 मीटर। तब ऊँचाई = 4 मीटर, लंबाई = 32 मीटर। पेंट करने वाला क्षेत्रफल = लंबाई × ऊँचाई = 32 × 4 = 128 मीटर²। लागत = 128 × 100 = 12800 रु।

english.explanation: Science students in C and D: 36 + 48 = 84. Computer Science students in A and E: 57 + 55 = 112. Ratio = 84:112 = 3:4.

hindi.explanation: संस्थान C और D में विज्ञान पढ़ने वाले छात्रों की संख्या = 36 + 48 = 84। संस्थान A और E में कंप्यूटर विज्ञान पढ़ने वाले छात्रों की संख्या = 57 + 55 = 112। अनुपात = 84:112 = 3:4।

english.explanation: Total persons = 50 (less than 400). Persons earning less than 250 = 26. Persons earning ≥250 = 50 - 26 = 24. Percentage = (24/50)*100 = 48%.

questions.original_question: A boat can go 5 km upstream and&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(7\frac{1}{2}\)</span>&nbsp;km downstream in 45 minutes. It can also go 5 km downstream and 2.5 km&nbsp;Upstream in 25 minutes. How much time (in minutes) will it take to go 6 km downstream?

english.explanation: Let boat speed = b km/h, stream speed = s km/h. Upstream speed = b-s, downstream = b+s. From the equations: 5/(b-s) + 7.5/(b+s) = 0.75 and 5/(b+s) + 2.5/(b-s) = 0.4167. Solving gives b=20, s=10. Time for 6 km downstream = 6/(20+10) = 0.2 hours = 12 minutes.

hindi.explanation: माना स्थिर जल में नाव की गति = b किमी/घंटा, धारा की गति = s किमी/घंटा। पहला मामला: 5/(b - s) + 7.5/(b + s) = 3/4, दूसरा मामला: 5/(b + s) + 2.5/(b - s) = 5/12। समीकरण हल करने पर, b - s = 10 किमी/घंटा, b + s = 30 किमी/घंटा। धारा के अनुकूल 6 किमी जाने में समय = 6/30 = 0.2 घंटा = 12 मिनट।

questions.original_question: If cos (2&theta; + 54&deg;) = sin&nbsp;&theta;, 0&deg; &lt; (2&theta; + 54&deg;) &lt; 90&deg;, then what is the value of 1/(Cot 5&theta; + Sec 5&theta;/2)?
If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\sqrt{x}-\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}}=\sqrt{7}\)</span>, then the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(x^2+\frac{1}{x^2}\)</span>&nbsp;is:

english.explanation: Square the equation: (√x - 1/√x)² = 7 → x - 2 + 1/x = 7 → x + 1/x = 9. Square again: (x + 1/x)² = 81 → x² + 2 + 1/x² = 81 → x² + 1/x² = 79.

hindi.explanation: माना x = √x, तब समीकरण: x - 1/x = √7। वर्ग करने पर, x² - 2 + 1/x² = 7 ⇒ x² + 1/x² = 9। फिर x⁴ + 1/x⁴ = (x² + 1/x²)² - 2 = 81 - 2 = 79।

questions.original_question: The interest (in Rs.) to be paid on a sum of Rs. 30000 at 15% p,a. after&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(2\frac{2}{3}\)</span>&nbsp;years if&nbsp;interest compounded yearly, is:

The average monthly salary of 60 employees of a fact Rs. 29900.&nbsp;If two officers are getting Rs. 90000 each and the&nbsp;average salary of 8 supervisors is Rs. 65000. then what is the average salary (in Rs.) of the remaining employees?
Points P and Q are on the sides AB and BC respectively of a triangle ABC, right angled at B. If AQ = 11 cm, PC = 8 cm.&nbsp;and AC = 13 cm, then find the length (in cm) of PQ:

english.explanation: Using coordinates: AQ² = a² + q² = 121, PC² = p² + c² = 64, AC² = a² + c² = 169. PQ² = p² + q² = (121 -a²) + (64 -c²) = 185 - (a² + c²) = 185 -169 = 16 → PQ=4.

hindi.explanation: समकोणीय त्रिभुज ABC में, AQ = 11 सेमी, PC = 8 सेमी, AC = 13 सेमी। निर्देशांक विधि द्वारा हल करने पर PQ की लंबाई = √(q² + p²) = 4 सेमी।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>One who supervises in an examination hall</p>

english.explanation: The term 'invigilator' specifically refers to a person who supervises an examination to prevent cheating. Other options like 'Inspector' or 'Manager' are more general and do not fit the context of an exam hall.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न अकेले के रूप में प्रदान किए गए हैं। प्रश्न और उत्तर विकल्प अनुपलब्ध होने के कारण विश्लेषण या समाधान प्रदान करना संभव नहीं है। कृपया पूर्ण प्रश्न और विकल्प प्रदान करें ताकि सही उत्तर और व्याख्या दी जा सके।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Censure</p>

english.explanation: 'Censure' means to criticize formally. Its antonym would be 'Applause', which signifies approval. 'Contempt' and 'Fault' are synonyms, while 'Blunder' is unrelated.

hindi.explanation: सभी प्रश्न अशुद्ध रूप में प्राप्त हुए हैं। बिना प्रश्न और विकल्प के सही उत्तर निर्धारित करना या विश्लेषण करना संभव नहीं है। कृपया प्रश्न और विकल्प दोनों के साथ पुनर्प्रस्तुति करें।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If no substitution is required, select &lsquo;No substitution&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p><u>The herd are grazing</u> in the fields far away from the farmer&rsquo;s hut.</p>

english.explanation: The collective noun 'herd' is singular and requires the singular verb 'is'. 'Are grazing' is incorrect because it treats 'herd' as plural. 'Is grazing' is the correct phrase.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्नों के सम्पूर्ण आंकड़े अनुपलब्ध होने के कारण उत्तर निर्धारित करना या व्याख्या देना संभव नहीं है। कृपया प्रश्न और विकल्प दोनों के साथ जानकारी प्रदान करें।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If no substitution is required, select &lsquo;No substitution&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p>Sunil <u>have been working</u> as a personal assistant to the Director for two years.</p>

english.explanation: The subject 'Sunil' is singular, so the present perfect continuous tense should use 'has been working'. 'Have been working' is incorrect as it uses the plural form of the verb.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न और विकल्प दोनों अनुपलब्ध होने के कारण विश्लेषण करना असंभव है। पूर्ण प्रश्न के साथ फिर से प्रस्तुति करें।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>A person preoccupied with an unrealistically optimistic approach to life</p>

english.explanation: 'Quixotic' refers to someone with unrealistic optimism, often pursuing lofty ideals. 'Pragmatic' and 'Practical' are opposites, while 'Rational' is unrelated.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न और विकल्प के अनुपस्थिति के कारण उत्तर प्रदान करना संभव नहीं है। कृपया सही और पूर्ण प्रश्न प्रदान करें।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them contains an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options.</strong></p>

<p>At the last meeting / which took place in November, / half the members submitted / their resignations on protest.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'on protest' is incorrect. The correct preposition is 'in protest'. The error lies in the underlined part due to incorrect preposition usage.

hindi.explanation: केवल प्रश्न आईडी उपलब्ध है। प्रश्न और विकल्प अनुपलब्ध होने के कारण विश्लेषण करना या उत्तर प्रदान करना असंभव है।

english.explanation: Sentence B introduces polymers, D connects them to other materials, A provides examples, and C explains their properties. This order (B-D-A-C) creates a logical flow.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न अपूर्ण है। बिना प्रश्न के उत्तर या व्याख्या प्रदान करना संभव नहीं है। कृपया प्रश्न और विकल्प दोनों प्रदान करें।

questions.original_question: <strong>Directions: Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: The correct spelling is 'Dictionary'. 'Dictonary' is a misspelling. The others are spelled correctly.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न और विकल्प अनुपलब्ध होने के कारण उत्तर प्रदान करना संभव नहीं है। पूर्ण जानकारी के साथ फिर से प्रश्न प्रस्तुत करें।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate meaning of the following idiom.</strong></p>

<p>To pay lip service</p>

english.explanation: 'To pay lip service' means to pretend to support something without genuine commitment. It implies insincerity rather than loudness or out-of-turn speech.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate meaning of the following idiom.</strong></p>

<p>To get the ball rolling&nbsp;</p>

options.value: To play a ball game well

english.explanation: 'To get the ball rolling' means to start or initiate a process. It does not refer to playing games or working late.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न के विकल्प अनुपलब्ध हैं। बिना विकल्प के सही उत्तर की पहचान नहीं की जा सकती।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Commence</p>

english.explanation: 'Commence' means to begin, so 'Start' is the correct synonym. 'Shoot', 'Stand', and 'Stop' are unrelated.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न अपूर्ण है। विश्लेषण करने के लिए अधिक जानकारी की आवश्यकता है। कृपया पूर्ण प्रश्न प्रदान करें।

english.explanation: Sentence D introduces the man, A describes his habit, B sets up the villagers' plan, and C concludes the story. The correct order is D-A-B-C.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न और विकल्प दोनों के अनुपस्थिति के कारण उत्तर निर्धारित करना संभव नहीं है। कृपया पूर्ण प्रश्न प्रदान करें।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in indirect speech.</strong></p>

<p>Kamal said, &ldquo;I have done my work.&rdquo;</p>

options.value: Kamal said I have done my work.
Kamal said that he has done his work.
Kamal said that I have done my work.
Kamal said that he had done his work.

english.correct_answer: 4. Kamal said that he had done his work.
english.explanation: In indirect speech, the past perfect tense ('had done') is used when the reported action occurred before the reporting. The pronoun changes from 'I' to 'he', and the sentence structure follows accordingly.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न अपूर्ण है। बिना प्रश्न और विकल्प के उत्तर प्रदान करना संभव नहीं है। कृपया पूर्ण जानकारी प्रदान करें।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>The cabinet has ______ a proposal to change the way universities are funded and managed.</p>

english.explanation: 'Endorsed' means to formally approve or support. 'Endangered' (threatened), 'Endeared' (became liked), and 'Evaporated' (vanished) do not fit the context of supporting a proposal.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न अव्यवस्थित है। विश्लेषण करने के लिए प्रश्न और विकल्प दोनों के आवश्यकता होती है।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>Researchers have found that 16 facial expressions _______ universally in similar contexts across 12 world regions.</p>

english.explanation: 'Occur' means to happen, which fits the context of facial expressions appearing in similar contexts. 'Transpire' and 'Befall' are less common, while 'Strike' is unrelated.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न और विकल्प दोनों अनुपलब्ध हैं। उत्तर प्रदान करने के लिए पूर्ण प्रश्न आवश्यक है।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<p>Shiva wrote a letter to the head of the HR Department in response to the advertisement.</p>

options.value: A letter was written by Shiva to the head of the HR department in response to the advertisement.
A letter had been written by Shiva to the head of the HR department in response to the advertisement.
&nbsp;A letter was written by the head of the HR department to Shiva in response to the advertisement
&nbsp;A letter was wrote by Shiva to the head of the HR department in response to the advertisement.

english.correct_answer: 1. A letter was written by Shiva to the head of the HR department in response to the advertisement.
english.explanation: The active voice sentence is converted to passive by making the object (letter) the subject. The correct structure is 'A letter was written by Shiva...' (Option 1). Option 3 reverses the subject and object. Option 4 uses the incorrect past tense 'wrote' instead of 'written'.

questions.original_question: <strong>Directions: Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: The correct spelling is 'Advisable' (not 'Adviseable'). The word is spelled with an 's' after 'a' in this context. Other options are correctly spelled.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Principle</p>

english.explanation: 'Principle' refers to a fundamental truth or belief. 'Axiom' is a synonym meaning a self-evident truth. 'Headmaster' and 'Leader' are unrelated to the meaning of 'principle'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word</strong>.</p>

<p>Triumph</p>

english.explanation: 'Triumph' means a great victory or success. Its antonym is 'Failure' (Option 4). Other options (Pride, Joy, Celebration) are unrelated to the opposite of victory.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them may contain an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options. If there is no error, select &lsquo;No error &rsquo; as your answer.</strong></p>

<p>My brother / who live in Pune / is arriving tomorrow.</p>

english.explanation: The relative clause 'who live in Pune' contains a subject-verb agreement error. 'My brother' is singular, so the verb should be 'lives' (not 'live'). The error is in Option 3.
